products.title: Orient Faux Silk Jade Green Roman Blind
products.description: Their orient faux-silk roman blinds are carefully made, look beautiful when fitted, and are light and durable. This jade faux-silk roman blind, introduces a soft, medium greenshade to your window, and looks fabulous either with matching or contrasting accessories. Add a touch of luxury to your home with their hand-made roman blinds. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why not only is this roman hand-made by an expert team, but it also comes with a free five year warranty, for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Velvet Leaf Green Roman Blind
products.description: Their soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, their smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. This soft roman blind in leaf green, adds a medium green hue to your home.

Fantastic functionality with a luxurious appeal, you will not be disappointed in their quality. Here at swift direct blinds we are so confident in their products we offer a 5-year guarantee to their customers.
